thread.title: Students in Pro-Gun, Rural States Embrace Walkouts

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Students in Pro-Gun, Rural States Embrace Walkouts
text:
Following last month’s shooting at a Florida high school, Colette Raptosh, a 17-year old senior from Boise, Idaho didn’t want to be left out of the student walkouts sweeping the country.
“I thought if any place needs an event like this it’s Idaho,” Ms. Raptosh said. “We have such a strong gun culture.”
Even in the more rural, conservative... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
